titles.title: North Country National Scenic Trail Route Adjustment Act

A bill to revise the authorized route of the North Country National Scenic Trail in northeastern Minnesota and to extend the trail into Vermont to connect with the Appalachian National Scenic Trail, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 7/10/2014--Introduced. North Country National Scenic Trail Route Adjustment Act - Amends the National Trails System Act to extend the North Country National Scenic Trail into Vermont.
